00020 #ifndef _RTAI_NUCLEUS_PIPE_H
00021 #define _RTAI_NUCLEUS_PIPE_H
00022 
00023 #define XNPIPE_NDEVS      CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_PIPE_NRDEV
00024 #define XNPIPE_DEV_MAJOR  150
00025 
00026 #define XNPIPE_IOCTL_BASE     'p'
00027 #define XNPIPEIOC_GET_NRDEV   _IOW(XNPIPE_IOCTL_BASE,0,int)
00028 #define XNPIPEIOC_FLUSH       _IO(XNPIPE_IOCTL_BASE,1)
00029 
00030 #ifdef __KERNEL__
00031 
00032 #include <nucleus/queue.h>
00033 #include <nucleus/synch.h>
00034 #include <nucleus/thread.h>
00035 #include <linux/types.h>
00036 #include <linux/poll.h>
00037 
00038 #define XNPIPE_WAIT   0x0
00039 #define XNPIPE_NOWAIT 0x1
00040 
00041 #define XNPIPE_NORMAL 0x0
00042 #define XNPIPE_URGENT 0x1
00043 
00044 #define XNPIPE_KERN_CONN   0x1
00045 #define XNPIPE_USER_CONN   0x2
00046 #define XNPIPE_USER_WOPEN  0x4
00047 #define XNPIPE_USER_WSEND  0x8
00048 #define XNPIPE_USER_WPOLL  0x10
00049 #define XNPIPE_USER_SIGIO  0x20
00050 #define XNPIPE_USER_ONWAIT 0x40
00051 
00052 #define XNPIPE_USER_WMASK \
00053 (XNPIPE_USER_WOPEN|XNPIPE_USER_WSEND|XNPIPE_USER_WPOLL)
00054 
00055 typedef struct xnpipe_mh {
00056 
00057     xnholder_t link;
00058     unsigned size;
00059     
00060 } xnpipe_mh_t;
00061 
00062 static inline xnpipe_mh_t *link2mh (xnholder_t *laddr)
00063 {
00064     return laddr ? ((xnpipe_mh_t *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((xnpipe_mh_t *)0)->link))) : 0;
00065 }
00066 
00067 typedef int xnpipe_io_handler(int minor,
00068                               struct xnpipe_mh *mh,
00069                               int onerror,
00070                               void *cookie);
00071 
00072 typedef int xnpipe_session_handler(int minor,
00073                                    void *cookie);
00074 
00075 typedef void *xnpipe_alloc_handler(int minor,
00076                                    size_t size,
00077                                    void *cookie);
00078 typedef struct xnpipe_state {
00079 
00080     xnholder_t slink;   /* Link on sleep queue */
00081     xnholder_t alink;   /* Link on async queue */
00082 #define link2xnpipe(laddr,link) \
00083 ((struct xnpipe_state *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((struct xnpipe_state *)0)->link)))
00084 
00085     xnqueue_t inq;      /* From user-space to kernel */
00086     xnqueue_t outq;     /* From kernel to user-space */
00087     xnpipe_io_handler *output_handler;
00088     xnpipe_io_handler *input_handler;
00089     xnpipe_alloc_handler *alloc_handler;
00090     xnsynch_t synchbase;
00091     void *cookie;
00092 
00093     /* Linux kernel part */
00094     xnflags_t status;
00095     struct linux_semaphore open_sem;
00096     struct linux_semaphore send_sem;
00097     struct linux_semaphore *wchan;      /* any sem */
00098     struct fasync_struct *asyncq;
00099     wait_queue_head_t pollq;
00100     size_t ionrd;
00101 
00102 } xnpipe_state_t;
00103 
00104 extern xnpipe_state_t xnpipe_states[];
00105 
00106 #define xnminor_from_state(s) (s - xnpipe_states)
00107

00112 int xnpipe_mount(void);
00113 
00114 void xnpipe_umount(void);

00118 void xnpipe_setup(xnpipe_session_handler *open_handler,
00119                   xnpipe_session_handler *close_handler);

00121 int xnpipe_connect(int minor,
00122                    xnpipe_io_handler *output_handler,
00123                    xnpipe_io_handler *input_handler,
00124                    xnpipe_alloc_handler *alloc_handler,
00125                    void *cookie);
00126 
00127 int xnpipe_disconnect(int minor);
00128 
00129 ssize_t xnpipe_send(int minor,
00130                     struct xnpipe_mh *mh,
00131                     size_t size,
00132                     int flags);
00133 
00134 ssize_t xnpipe_recv(int minor,
00135                     struct xnpipe_mh **pmh,
00136                     xnticks_t timeout);
00137 
00138 int xnpipe_inquire(int minor);
00139 
00140 #ifdef __cplusplus
00141 }
00142 #endif /* __cplusplus */
00143 
00144 static inline xnholder_t *xnpipe_m_link(xnpipe_mh_t *mh)
00145 {
00146     return &mh->link;
00147 }
00148 
00149 static inline char *xnpipe_m_data(xnpipe_mh_t *mh)
00150 {
00151     return (char *)(mh + 1);
00152 }
00153 
00154 #define xnpipe_m_size(mh) ((mh)->size)
